Key Match Events: The Twins tied the game 4-4 with a rally in the 7th and 8th innings
Jhoan Duran allowed four runs in the 10th inning, including a 101 mph double and a 105.4 mph single
Post-Match Reflections: The Twins fell 2.5 games behind the Royals and Guardians in the AL Central
The Twins have lost seven of their last nine games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins' bullpen ERA over the last nine games is 4.75, ranking 23rd in the majors
Others: The Twins' rally in the 8th inning was followed by a strikeout with two runners on to end the game
